price: 38.Nabii Suleymaan konnaba-le abbobtiy tet (bilqhiis kinnuk) qarkaytó iyyi siinik yoh baahaah usun muslimiinih anuk yol yamaateenik naharat keenik iyye
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِي بِعَرۡشِهَا قَبۡلَ أَن يَأۡتُونِي مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāayyuhā al-mala-u ayyukum yatīnī biʿarshihā qabla an yatūnī mus'limīna
